org.infogrid.comm

Interface CarriesInvocationId


  • public interface CarriesInvocationId
    An interface supported by Messages that need to keep track of invocations, such as for Remote Procedure Calls. The request ID is generated by the sender. The receiver takes the requested ID (if present) and sets it as the response ID; the latter is what the sender looks for in incoming messages as response.
